import sys

cases = int(sys.stdin.readline())
while cases > 0:
    min_val = -1
    min_pos = -1
    cases -= 1
    candles = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    #print cases, c
    min_c = min(candles)
    
    for i in range(1,10):
	if candles[i] == min_c:
	    min_val = i
	    break

    if candles[i] > candles[0]:
        min_val = 0
    else:
	min_val = i

    temp = [min_val]*(candles[min_val]+1)
    
    if min_val == 0:
	ans = "1"
    else:
	ans = ""

    for e in temp:
	ans = ans + str(e)

    print ans
